title: Kaley Cuoco shares a slew of snaps as 'dream home' she and Karl Cook are building nears completion
text:
It looks like their 'dream home' is nearly ready.

On Friday, Kaley Cuoco shared snaps of the house that she and her champion equestrian husband Karl Cook, 28, are building in her Instagram stories.

It's now in the fittings stage with the 33-year-old enthusing about two very special lamps - one with a modern look featuring a slew of glass icicles and another more antique piece that looks like a glass bucket.

Happy couple: Kaley Cuoco had husband Karl Cook to lean on at The Big Bang Theory's finale party at The Langham Huntington, Pasadena on May 01. Now they're getting ready for the next stage in their lives by building their 'dream home'

'I see trees': The 33-year-old shared a slew of snap of their new property in her Instagram stories on Friday, including this one suggesting landscaping has begun

The light and airy kitchen is kitted out in white and glass cabinets with huge windows in the vaulted ceiling and behind the sink.

What could be the lounge also has a vaulted ceiling with the beams stained dark brown to match the dark wood floor that runs through part of the house.

Shots Kaley took of her going down the stairs showed one of her five dogs waiting patiently at the bottom. 'Mornings with creepy Shirley,' the former Big Bang Theory actress captioned it.

And work is starting on landscaping the property as trees had either been preserved on the site or had just been delivered. 'I see trees,' she enthused in the caption, suggesting the latter option.

Almost there: The light and airy kitchen is kitted out in white and glass cabinets with huge windows in the vaulted ceiling and behind the sink but it still needs work

Kaley caption this 'Perfection': What could be the lounge also has a vaulted ceiling with beams stained dark brown to match the dark wood floor that run through part of the house

The property may even include stables for the couple's horses.

'We’re building our dream house. We’re eventually going to be under the same roof forever,' Kaley told Today back in August, after admitting that she and Karl often lived separately.

The couple previously lived in a nearly 8,000-square-foot home in the Mulholland Park neighborhood of Tarzana, Ca.

She put it up for sale earlier this year at $6.9 million before slashing $1 miilion off the price.

That's a steep staircase: She shared this shot of one of her dogs waiting patiently for her at the bottom of the stairs

Where's her pals? Shirley, who appeared to be standing on easy-to-clean tile in the hall, is just one of the couple's five dogs

Meanwhile Kaley and Karl began dating in late 2016 and got engaged on her 32nd birthday, November 30, 2017.

The couple tied the knot in June 2018 in Southern California, in a barn-themed wedding which included their many horses and dogs.

After wrapping the Big Bang Theory on May 16 after 12 seasons, Kaley is setting up new projects via her new Yes, Norman production company.

She will voice Harley Quinn in the new animated TV series and is producing and starring in thriller The Flight Attendant, based on source material she optioned in 2017.

Let there be light: Kaley enthused about this modern look fixture featuring a slew of glass icicles that she captioned, 'Pretty Baby'

'It's the little things': She also drew attention to this and more antique glass and metal piece
description:
It looks like their 'dream home' is nearly ready.
On Friday, the actress, 33, shared snaps of the house that she and her champion equestrian husband, 28, are building in her Instagram stories.
